actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a tax credit for a portion of utility cost incurred by individuals in connection with their principal residence.

summary.text: Provides a tax credit under the Internal Revenue Code for a portion of utility cost incurred by individuals in connection with their principal residences.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a tax credit for a portion of utility cost incurred by individuals in connection with their principal residence.
